description:
Aiden is gearing up to tackle an IQ assessment. Among the array of challenges, one recurrent task demands discerning which of the provided n numerical values deviates from the norm. Aiden observed that typically, a single number distinguishes itself from the rest by its parity. To aid Aiden in verifying his responses, he seeks a program capable of pinpointing the odd one out among the given n numbers based on evenness.




`Input  : ` 

The first line contains an integer, n (3 ≤ n ≤ 100), which represents the number of integers in the sequence. The second line consists of n space-separated natural numbers, each not exceeding 100. It is guaranteed that exactly one of these numbers differs from the others in terms of evenness


`Output :`

Output index of number that differs from the others in evenness. Numbers are numbered from 1 in the input order.
title: Odd One Out: Bob's IQ Challenge
